title: From surgery to doubt to dominance: How the Bengals' Joe Burrow returned to form
description: It's been nearly a year since Burrow injured his right wrist against Baltimore, and now he's again facing the Ravens -- healthy and playing better than ever.
author: Ben Baby

title: After the stunning death of a coach, how the Ravens are playing this season for him
description: Offensive line coach Joe D'Alessandris died of a heart attack 11 days before the season started.
author: Jamison Hensley

title: Watch now: Fantasy Football Live is back for Week 10
description: Yahoo Sports' fantasy analysts cover the breaking news, important injuries and help managers set their lineups. Use #askFFL on social to interact with the show.
author: Yahoo Sports Videos

title: Manchester City continue bad form, NYCFC defender Kevin O’Toole joins & Jim Curtin fired!?
description: Christian and Alexis react to Man City’s embarrassing Champions League loss. Then, the guys discuss chat with NYCFC defender Kevin O’Toole. Later, Christian and Alexis react to the firing of Philadelphia Union head coach Jim Curtin.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: F1 drivers call out FIA president in response to swearing saga
description: The Grand Prix Drivers' Association (GPDA) has called out FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem in response to Formula 1's recent swearing saga.

title: Mbappe left out of France squad despite 'wanting' to play
description: Kylian Mbappe has been left out of France's squad for November's Nations League games, despite coach Didier Deschamps saying the Real Madrid player "wanted to come".

title: Will Lawrence switch improve England's attack?
description: England hope switching Ollie Lawrence to outside centre against Australia will enable the Bath star to bring his ball-carrying power to the fore on Saturday.

title: Swiatek exits WTA Finals after Krejcikova win
description: Iga Swiatek is knocked out of the WTA Finals after group rival Barbora Krejcikova beat Coco Gauff to secure her place in the semi-finals.
